column2: Pablo Escobar: hatowe amafaranga menshi yanyegejwe mu nzu y'uyu yahoze acuruza ibiyayuramutwe
column3: Umuhungwabo w'uwahoze ari rurangiranwa mu rucuruza rw'ibiyayuramutwe Pablo Escobar avuga ko yatoye isashe yuzuye amafaranga angana na miliyoni 18 z'amadolari yari anyegeje mu ruhome rw'imwe mu nzu za se wabo. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Colombia aho bashobora gusanga aya mafaranga mu nzu asanzwe abamwo mu gisagara ca Medellín. Avuga ko atari bwo bwa mbere atoye amafaranga mu bibanza se wabo atashaka kubonamwo umuntu, ni mu gihe uyu Escobar avugwa ko yasize anyegeje amamiliyoni menshi mu mazu yiwe. Yapfuye mu mwaka wa 1993 arashwe n'abapolisi. Igihe yagera kw'isonga ry'umwuga wiwe, Escobar yaramenyekanye ko yari umuntu agira indwi atunze kw'isi yose. Kuva apfuye, hagumye hari ibihuha i Medellín  ko Escobar yanyegeje amatungo yiwe, inyuma y'imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo arwana na leta ya Colombia yashaka kumurungika muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zariko ziramuhiga. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Colombia Red+ Noticias ko yatoye kandi n'imashini yo kwandika, amatelefone yakorana naza satellite, ikaramu y'inzahabu, kamera hamwe na firime y'amafoto atari bwogeshwe. Ati: "Igihe cose naricara mu cumba co gufungura, nkaraba muri parikingi y'imodoka, nama mbona umugabo yinjira muri ico kibanza agaca agenda". "Umunuko wari muri ico kibanza wari uteye ubwoba. Umunuko wasumvya incuro ijana uwuva mu kintu capfuye". Nicolás Escobar, yari asanzwe aba muri iyo nzu mu myaka itanu iheze, avuga ko amwe mu manoti amaze imyaka mirongo yari yaboze ku buryo atokoreshwa. Mu kiganiro, avuga ko kenshi yama aherekeza se wabo, kandi ko igihe kimwe yigeze kunyuruzwa n'abantu bariko barondera aho Escobar yari yinyegeje. Ati: " Naraborejwe igufa mu kiringo c'amasaha indwi yose. Bamwe mu bakozi banje bakubiswe umusumenu". Escobar yavukiye ahitwa Rionegro muri Colombia mu 1949, akaba yatanguje akarwi kacuruza ibiyayuramutwe mu gisagara ca Medellín mu myaka ya 1970. Mu myaka uru rudandazwa rwari rukomeye cane, aka karwi niko kinjije mu buryo bwa magendo hafi ibice 80% vy'urumogi rwinjijwe muri Amerika. Ubutunzi bwiwe bwamutumye ashirwa ku rutonde rwa Forbes (ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru y'ubutunzi) rw'abatunzi ba mbere w'isi mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi yose. Igihe Amerika isohoreye umutahe wo kumurondera, Escobar yararwanye intambara kugira ntashobore gufatwa, aho akarwi kiwe kakoze ibitero ku banyapolitike, abapolisi n'abamenyeshamakuru. Amaze gufatwa mu 1991, Escobar yapfungiwe mw'ibohero yubatswe ku ntumbero we nyene yatanze, yari yataziriwe Katederari (Cathedral), ayo yabandanije agenzura urudandaza rwiwe i Medellín. Muri rusangi, Escobar aharurwako abantu bagera ku 4000 bishwe. Ariko rero, amamuko yiwe y'umuntu yicisha bugufi yatumye amenyekana mu Banyakolombiya batari bake bari bamushigikiye kubera amafaranga menshi yabaha, mbere akaba yarafashije uturere dukenye mu gisagara ca Medellín.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Motsepe agiye gutwara Caf ubwo asigaye ari wenyene mw'ihiganwa
column3: Patrice Motsepe niwe agiye kuba umukuru w'urwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Africa (Caf)  inyuma y'aho igihano c'imyaka itanu ca Ahmad kigabanirijwe kikaja ku myaka ibiri  na sentare ijejwe amatati mu nkino (Cas) kuri uyu wa mbere. Inzira y'uwo mutunzi aharura amafaranga muri za miriyaridi Motsepe yo kuba umunya-Afrika y'Epfo wa mbere atwaye Caf ubu ni umuharuro inyuma y'aho batatu mu bo bahiganwa basokoreye mu mpera z'indwi yaraye iheze. Intambanyi ya nyuma  kugira uwo mugabo w'imyaka 59  ashikire ico kibanza ku wa gatanu yari kuba  ukugaruka kw'uwahora atwara Caf Ahmad, yari akeneye gutsinda rwose urubanza rw'ingingo yafatiwe na FIfa kugira ashobore kuja  muri ayo matora. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 61 aturuka muri Madagascar ntiyabishitseko, n'ubwo yateye intambwe mu kuba igihano ciwe cavuyeko ibirenga ica kabiri, n'amafaranga yaciriwe kuriha akava ku bihumbi birenga 200 vy'ama dolari agashirwa ku bihumbi birenga gato 50 gusa. N'ubwo yejejwe ku bijanye n'ivyo Caf yakoranye na kompanyi yo mu Bufaransa Tactical Steel, Ahmad  yagiriwe no kurenga ku zindi ngingio zitatu za Fifa. Cas yavuze mw'itangazo iti: ''Abagize Cas mu ruhande rumwe bahaye agaciro urubanza rwungurujwe bagabanya ikiringo c'igihano cari caciriwe Ahmad gishirwa ku myaka ibiri, guhera uyu munsi, havuyemwo ico amaze kumara hagati y'itariki 19 z'ukwezi kwa 11 mu 2020 n'itariki 29 ukwezi kwa mbere mu 2021, banagabanya ihadabu." Urwego rujejwe amatati rusanga Ahmad ata nyungu ku giti ciwe zaranze amasezerano hagati ya Caf na Tactical Steel, ikigo gikora ibikoresho vyo kwinonora imitsi, ariko amasezerano akaba yari yerekeye ko iyo kompanyi yogurisha kuri Caf imyambaro yo gukinana. Ariko yagiriwe no kuba yararenze ingingo z'akarangamutima zijanye no 'gutanga no kwakira  utuganuke canke utundi turusho', 'gukoresha nabi ubutegetsi' no 'gukoresha uburyo nk'uko bwoba ari rwawe'' Abantu batatu bagize Cas bemeje ata n'umwe avuyemwo ko hatagaragara neza inyandiko zerekeye amafaranga Ahmad yahawe ''kw'iherekanwa ritandukanye  ry'amafaraga, kwemera  guhabwa amafaranga abona, ayaciye muri banki n'utundi turusho tudaciye mu masezerano canke mu nzira zitegekanijwe'. Ariko ku bijanye no gufata ingingo niba gutunganya urugendo rw'idini rwa Umrah muri Arabia Saudite  Ahmad yararenze ingingo zijanye no gutanga utuganuke hongeyeko kwiyitirira uburyo, aho habonetse igitigiri gikenewe gusa kugira ingingo yemezwe.

column2: Uyu muringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA?
column3: Hari akaringa gashasha gaherutse kwemerwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ko kokoreshwa mu gukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA. Ni akaringa gakozwe muri silicone  kinjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze kakarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. N'aho hari intambwe zimaze gushikwako mu kuvura no gukinga, umugera wa SIDA uracasasika inganda mu bihugu bitari bike cane cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibice bibiri vya bitatu vy'abantu bose banduye umugera wa SIDA kw'isi bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, bafise imyaka hagati ya 15 na 24, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe ONU. Mu buseruko n'ubumanuko bwa Afrika, abantu barenga imiriyoni 20 bagendana uwu mugera. Abagore bakiri bato nibo ahanini babangamirwa: ku ncuro zibiri ugereranije n'abagabo, abagore nibo bafise igihamana kibi co kwandura umugera wa SIDA. OMS iherutse gutanga uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uwu muringa kugira ngo abagore bashobore kwikingira mu gihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Mu kiganiro Africa Daily ca BBC, Doreen Morah Moracha w'imyaka 28 aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA avuga ko kwikingira ari co kintu ca mbere kiza imbere mu kurwanya uwu mugera. Moracha amaze imyaka 16 yose afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza. Kubw'iwe, gufata iyi miti ubuzima bwose si ikintu coroshe. Ati: "Nipfuza ko abandi bose bokwikingira uwu mugera wa SIDA, kubera burya hari abibaza ko ari ibintu vyoroshe, ariko gufata imiti ubuzima bwawe bwose si ikintu coroshe na gato". Bumwe mu buryo bukoreshwa cane mu kwikingira umugera wa SIDA, harimwo udukingirizo, harimwo mbere n'agakingirizo k'abagore. Umupfasoni Moracha avuga ko abagore batoroherwa kugakoresha kubera akenshi usanga atari bo bifatira ingingo. Avuga ko abagabo bobo boroherwa gukoresha agakingirizo kabo kubera akenshi umugabo ari we afata ingingo. Ati: "Iyo umugore asavye ko bokwikingira, umugabo atabishatse aca akamomora akagata, rero muri ico gihe umugore nta bubasha aba afise bwo gufata ingingo". Hari kandi ibinini bifatwa imbere canke inyuma y'imibonano mpuzabitsina (PREP) ku muntu atarandura uwu mugera, ariko ibi navyo ntivyoroshe kuronka. Uwo muringa uje kuba nk'inyishu kuri izo ngorane. Ni umuringa wambarwa mu kiringo c'imisi 28, hanyuma muri ico kiringo cose ugasohora umuti uzwi nka dapivirine utuma umuntu atandura umugera wa SIDA. Anna Kukundakwe ajejwe imigambi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko umugore we nyene ubwiwe ashobora kwishirira uru muringa mu gitsina, atarinze gufashwa n'umuganga. Ati: "Kenshi iyo umugore yipfuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsinda yikingiye, ntibimworohera gusaba ko uwo bashaka kuyikorana yambara agakingirizo. Ariko uwu muringa uramuha ububasha bwo kwikingira igihe abishatse mw'ibanga, kandi ntategerezwa kubwira umugabo ko awambaye". Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwu muringa, vyabonetse ko igihamana kibi co kwandura uwu mugera cagabanutse gushika ku bice vyababa 30% gusa, ariko Rachel Bagley arongoye igisata co gupima imiti mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, avuga ko bishobora kuja hasi gusumba. Uwu muringa wambarwa n'uyo mugore yiyizi ko atarandura umugera kandi yiyizi ko akunze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, umupfasoni Anna akavuga ko abadakunze gukora iyo mibonano batokwirukira uwo muringa. Ati: "Rero abagore boronswa inyigisho zikwiye mu buryo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo bashobore kwihitiramwo bo nyene uburyo bokoresha, nimba bipfuza gukoresha agakingirizo, ibinini canke uwu muringa". Igiciro c'uwo muringa ntikiramenyekana neza, ariko umupfasoni Bagley avuga ko utegerezwa kuzoba utazimvye, uri ku giciro kimwe n'ubundi bukingirizo. Yipfuza ko uwu muringa woba ku giciro giciriritse cane cane mu bihugu bikenye birangwamwo umugera ku rugero runini, mbere ugatangwa ku buntu.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
column3: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

column2: Bazamuganga: Uburwayi bwa Fibromes Uterins bumeze gute?
column3: Abagore n'abigeme bageze mu myaka yo kwibaruka barashobora  kugira ikibazo c'ibivyimba mu bice vy'igitereko/ Fibromes Uterins Ibi bivyimba bikunda kuboneka ku birabure gusumba ayandi moko (mu bazungukazi bifata abagera ku bice 20% nayo mu birabure barenga 50%). Ni ingwara kuri bamwe itera ububabare bukomeye cane, n'aho ata vyinshi bivugwa ku bushakashatsi bwo kumenya impamvu zavyo n'ingene vyokwirindwa. Forentine Kwizera avugana na Muganga Thierry Mako, yanonosoye gukwirikirana abavyeyi (Gyneco-obstetricien), atangura amubaza uburyo ivyo bivyimba bimenyekana ku wubifise (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru).

column2: Mbali Sana: Steven Sogo aravuga ku rukurikirane rushasha rw'indirimbo ziwe
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Steven Sogo ubu aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, araganira na BBC Gahuzamiryango ku rukurikirane (album) rushasha rw'indirimbo ziwe aheruka gusohora yise Mbali Sana. Mbali Sana, canke Kure Cane mu Kirundi, ni urukurikirane rugira gatatu rwa Steven Sogo, akaba arusohoye nyuma y'imyaka indwi atanguye kurutegura. Steven Sogo aganira na Robert Patrick Misigaro wa BBC Gahuzamiryango, ku gituma vyatwaye igihe kirekire kugira Mbali Sana isohoke, igihe ashobora kuremeshereza igiteramo mu Burundi, n'ibindi... (Kanda aho hejuru mw'ifoto wumvirize)

column2: France: Urugendo rurerure rwa 'Extreme-droite' rwo gushikira ubutegetsi mu Bufaransa
column3: Marine Le Pen yaragize urugendo, ashikana umugambwe wa 'Extreme-droite' (uhagaze ku migenzo ya kera no gudashima abimukira) mu kibanza ushobora gukabakaba ubutegetsi mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. N'inyuma y'aho asubiriye se wiwe ku burongozi bwa Front National, muri 2011, yamaze imyaka agerageza gushika ku rugero rwo kuwukurako iceyi, rwari rukenewe kugira wiyumve nk'umugambwe wimirije gufata ubutegetsi. Politike yiwe ku bimukira no gushira imbere guha inzu n'akazi abafaransa yarabigumije, ariko uwo mupfasoni arongoye uwo mugambwe wa Front National yerekana isura y'umuntu ari hagati na hagati kandi atahurwa n'abantu benshi. "Ego ndi umuntu yorora inyabu yabigize umwuga, mu yindi nzira ndi umurimyi," uko ni ko yavugiye kuri France Inter mu kwezi kwa mbere. Le Pen afise inyabu zitandatu kandi ziragaragara ku mavideo yo ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Tik Tok eka mbere no ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Instagram. Igihe umuhinga muri politike Chloe Morin yabaza umugwi w'abazitaba amatora i Lille mu mwaka uheze uko babona uwo mudamu, inyabu ni zo zaza imbere. Ni nde atokwizera urya mupfasoni w'inyabu? Ashobora kuboneka nk'umuntu ari hagati na hagati, ariko politike yiwe nta ho itandukaniyeko n'iyahahoze ku bimukira, ku bwenegihugu no kuri Islam. Emmanuel Macro yavuze ko politike yiwe ishingiye ku macakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. James Shields, yigisha igifaransa muri kaminuza ya Warwick avuga ko amajambo yerekana amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba atagikoreshwa. Ariko amategeko n'ingingo vy'uwo mugambwe wa se wiwe umaze igihe kirekire vyo kugwanya abimukira ntibirahinduka na gato. Le Pen agiye mu ngunga ya kibiri y'amatora yo ku musi w'Imana afise amahirwe yo gutsinda. Bitandukanye no mu myaka itanu iheze aho atari yiteguye, aho yabuze ayo acira n'ayo amira mu kiganiro co ku mboneshakure imbere y'amatora Macron yatsinze aronse ibice bibiri kuri bitatu vy'amajwi. Ariko aramaze kuvyifatamwo neza gusumba se wiwe, Jean-Marie Le Pen, yatsindiye kuja mu ngunga ya kabiri y'amatora mu 2002 yishimikije kugwanya abimukira  no gusubiza igihugu ku murongo. Yatsinzwe kubera ibice 82% biyamirije politike yiwe bagereranije n'ubumara. Uwo yari umugabo atahengeshanije kuvuga, kuva mu 1987, ko ivyumba vy'abanazi biciramwo abantu hakoreshejwe gaz ari "akantu gato kabaye mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose" kandi yagumye yagirizwa urwanko ku bayahudi. Imyiyamamazo yiwe ubu ifise ivyivugo vya Marine prezida kandi "Ku bafaransa bose". Nta zina rya Le Pen rivugwa, ukwikurako iceyi gusa n'ukuriko kurakunda. Afise imyaka icenda, ni ho yabona uko se wiwe ameze, igihe yacika kw'icumu ku gitero ca bombe co mu 1976, cononye cane inzu y'umuryango wa Le Pen hagati mu gisagara ca Paris. Mu gitabo c'ubuzima bw'iwe arasigura ingene we na bakuru we babiri "bari bapfukamye hasi, bagugumwa, bafatanye amaboko... aho twumva ijwi rya data avugira hejuru: "Bakobwa bakobwa muracari bazima?" Mu nyuma, abana bigana bahawe itegeko ryo kutamwegera: "Haciye hashirwaho umuzingi wo kwikingira iruhande yacu - Ntimwegere ba Le Pen." Hanyuma igihe yari afise imyaka 16, nyina wiwe Pierrette yaciye ajana n'umwanditsi w'igitabo c'ubuzima bwa se wiwe. Ku mwana w'umuyabaga nka Marine, cabaye igihe kibabaje catumye yegera cane se wiwe. Mu gitabo c'ubuzima bwiwe casohotse mu 2011 avuga ati: "Namaze ukwezi kose n'igice nyogwa buri musi. Ntivyakunda ko nigaburira." Imyaka yamaze muri ivyo bintu yatumye akomantara cane inyuma nk'uko asanzwe abizwiko. Agatwengo yerekana imbere y'abafata amafoto kamara umwanya urume rumara. Umugenzi wiwe Steeve Briois yabwiye BBC ati: "Inyuma y'ibintu vyose yaciyemwo mu buto bwiwe, yaciye yiyugara". Yagumye ari umugenzi wiwe wa hagafi, nk'umukuru w'igisagara afise ku muzirikanyi ca Henin-Beaumontm mu buraruko bw'Ubufaransa. Inyuma yo kuronka urupapuro rw'umutsindo muri imwe muri za kaminuza z'i Paris zigisha amategeko mu ntango za 1990, yaciye akora akazi ko kuburanira abadashobora kuronaka amahera yo kuriha abashingwamanza. Rimwe na rimwe wasanga harimwo abimukira badakurikije amategeko. Babimubajije mu nyuma, yavuze ko atabona ahari ubudasa: "Ni ibiremwa muntu, barafise uburenganzira, ntawobarenganya ku bijanye na politike y'abimukira." Umushingwamanza w'i Paris, Basile Ader yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndatangarira ingene aguma atuje kandi akanashobora kugumana imigenderanire myiza mu kazi n'aho yaba yikoreye umuzigo w'uko se wiwe avugwa." Mu 1998, ntiyari bwamenyere neza akazi. Narababajwe n'ingene abandi bashingwamanza bamwigira kure kubera politike ya se wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, yaciye ava muri ako kazi, agenywe mu kibanza co hejuru kiraba ivyo amategeko muri Front National. Hariho akantu ka mpinga yanje aho mu 2004 yaratowe nk'umushingamateka w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya anamarayo imyaka 13. Ugutandukana na se. N'imbere y'uko asubirira se wiwe  nk'umukuru wa Front National, vyaragaragara ko afise amakenga kuri bimwe mu vyiyumviro vyerekeye kahise k'abanazi. Igihe mu 2005, Jean-Marie Le Pen yabwira ikinyamakuru ca 'Extreme-droite' ko igihe abadagi bigarurira Ubufaransa "ata bikorwa bibi vyakorewe abantu n'aho habaye amakosa amwe amwe", yariyumviriye gutanga imihoho mu mabanga y'icegera ciwe. Umuhanuzi wiwe Bruno Bilde avuga ko mu mutima wiwe yaniyumviriye guheba politike. Kazoza ka se wiwe kagiye kwerekanwa n'igihe mu matora ya 2007 yaronka amajwi 10% hanyuma mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, Marine Le Pen ni we yahagarariye umugambwe. Igihe yariko ariyamamariza kurongora uwo mugambwe, isura ya kazoza ya Front National yarateje agashavu. Yabwiye abamushigikiye i Lyon ko kubona aba Islam bariko barasengera mu mabarabara vyasa n'igihe abanazi bigarurira Ubufaransa. Ubwa mbere haje "ukwongerekana kwo kwambara ibitambara" hanyuma "ukwiyongera kwa Burkha". Ubu nta bimodoka bitamenwa canke abasirikare bahari "ariko haracari ukwigarurirwa kandi biraremera abanyagihugu". "Extreme-droite ni isura y'ubuntu" ni ko umufaransa Bernard-Henri Lévy yagereranije Marine mu gihe kimwe. Yaranakuweko iceyi co guhembera urwanko. Yaciye kandi yihutira kwikurako bamwe mu batama bari bashigikiye Le Pen, benshi muri bo berekana ko bashima intwaro ya Vichy yakoranye n'aba Nazi mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Ariko guha amahera "Extreme-droite" mu Bufaransa biracaboneka nabi ku buryo yagiye gusaba ideni Uburusiya rya miliyoni 11 z'ama Euro mu mwaka Vladimir Putin yigarura ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Yaranashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya mu matora y'amayeri yo kwigarurira Crime. Le Pen yashize inguvu nyinshi k'uco abona kibangamiye ubuzima bw'abafaransa: "Ikwiragira rya Islam, gufatira mu kivunga, EU n'ifaranga rya Euro. Mu matora ya 2012 yabaye uwa gatatu. Mu 2017, Front National yari irongowe n'urwaruka rw'abahinga mu gukoresha YouTube aho baronse ababashigikira benshi hirya no hino mu Bufaransa. Uwo mugambwe wararonse intsinzi mu matora y'ibanze, aya Buraya hamwe n'ay'uturere, unavuga ko ufise aba Islam n'abayahudi bawushigikiye. N'aho yatsinzwe cane na Emmanuel Macron mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu, yararonse amajwi ashika ku miliyoni 7.7. Yoba yaramaze ubumara muri 'Extreme-droite'? Inyuma y'imyaka itanu, ashobora kwishimira kuba yaratumye uwo mugambwe ushobora gutorwa mbere cane, kubera izina ryoroheje rya Rassemblement National no kwemerera abantu kwicisha bugufi bitangukanye n'ivyo bagiriza prezida ko aterekwa abantu bato bato. Ariko aratembera mw'isoko yemereye abantu ko "Nzotwara igihugu nk'umuvyeyi - ata gusesagura kandi nkurikije uko bibereye". Mu gihe rero ingorane ya mbere y'amatora ari ingene ubuzima bugenda buzimba, yibanze cane ku kugira imyiyamamazo kuri ico kintu. Abantu ntibagishoboye gutunga imodoka: Yavuze vyo. Prof James Shields yagize ati: "Imigambi ya Rassemblement National  co kimwe n'iya Front National yayitanguriye, iracubakiye ku bafaransa ubwabo ubwa mbere, kubaronsa akazi imbere y'abandi, amazu, imfashanyo zo mu mibano hamwe n'amagara yabo. Yibaza ko Le Pen ashobora kutabandanya ashigikira kuva muri Eu, ariko imigambi yiwe ishobora gutuma haba ugukwaruzanya, bishobora gutuma impera n'imperuka Ubufaransa bukura meza muri iryo shirahamwe. Ku ba Islam b'abafaransa, ivyo asaba vyo kwirinda kwitwikira mu bibanza bigenewe abantu benshi birabateye amakenga cane. Igihe umupfasoni ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru yitwikiriye yamuhamagarira kubaha amahoro mu ndwi iheze, Le Pen yavuze ko mu bice bimwe bimwe biba ngombwa ko abapfasoni bitwikira kugira ntibahave babonwa nabi. Uwo mupfasoni yitwa Fatima, yasiguye ko yatanguye kwitwikira amaze gukura, ashaka kuvuga ko yari afise abuzukuru. Le Pen yagirizwa n'abo bahanganye ko yiyamamariza gusa aho afise abanywanyi. Ariko igihe abamwiyamiriza batangura gusemerera ngo "Fasciste" bakamusaba gukinjura, yaragerageje kubandanya amwenyura, avuga ko uko inyishu zikariha ari na ko aguma aronka amahirwe yo gutsinda amatora. Mu gihe yotahukana intsinzi, se wiwe Jean-Marie Le Pen ashobora kunezerwa cane. Ariko abandanya yemeza ko hari "ibihumbi" vy'ubudasa hagati yabo. Marine yasiguye ati: "Yari prezida w'umuhari mu ntango wo kwerekana akababaro hanyuma uhinduka uwutavuga rumwe na reta. Naratunganije akazi ku migwi yanje "ku buryo dushobora kuja ku butegetsi tukanashira mu bikorwa ivyiyumviro vyacu".

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Brazil: Abirabure bariyamiriza ivanguramoko n'ihohoterwa rikorwa n'igiporisi
column3: Abirabure ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Brésil barakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba bakorerwa hamwe n'itotezwa bakorerwa n'igiporisi, hari ku musi bibuka ivanwaho ry'ubucakara muri ic ogihugu. Abari mu myiyerekano mu gisagara ca Rio de Janeiro bari bafise amabuji n'ivyapa vyanditseko ngo "Ntunyice, ni wice ivanguramoko", hari haciye indwi igiporisi giteye mu karere kamwe abaharurwa muri mirongo bakahasiga ubuzima. Mu gisagara ca São Paulo, ivyapa vyari vyanditseko ngo : "Abirabure bakeneye kubaho". Abahinga bavuga ko abirabure bicwa n'igiporisi ku rugero rw'incuro zitatu muri Brésil. Abari mu myiyerekano bagiriza Perezida Jair Bolsonaro ko ariko akora ihonyabwoko akoresheje igiporisi. Asanzwe ashigikiye amategeko atoroshe na gato yashizweho mu kurwanya ubukozi bw'ikibi, muri yo  hakaba harimwo gukora ibitero mu turere turwiriyemwo abirabure n'abakene. Abari mu myiyerekano kandi basaba ko isekeza ryo gucandaga Covid-19 rinyaruka, kubera iki kiza cihanye inkumbi mu birabure muri kino gihugu, kimwe mu bihugu bibangamiwe cane n'iki kiza. Mu gisagara ca Rio, abari mu myiyerekano bariyamirije igandagurwa ry'abantu 28 mu ndwi iheze muri karitiye ya Jacarezinho favela mu gihe igiporisi cahakora igitero, kivuga ko cariko kirahiga abakora magendo y'ibiyayuramutwe. Basaba ko ababikoze bashirwa imbere y'intahe. Nico gitero c'igiporisi cahitanye abantu benshi mu mateka y'ico gisagara Ababa muri ico gisagara bagiriza igiporisi ko kibakubagura, mu gihe amashirahamwe aharanira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu nayo avuga ko hari ivyemezo ko habaye ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, aho abaporisi batatinya kwica abagomba kwishikana canke ata ngorane bateye. Aya mashirahamwe avuga ko bamwe mu bishwe ata n'icabagira. Abari mu myiyerekano bazungurutse hagati mu gisagara, bafise ivyapa vyanditseko ubutumwa ngo: "Mbega igiporisi gikingiye ba nde?" hamwe na "Nta rusoro, nta kigoyi, nta Covid". Icapa kimwe cariko amafoto y'abagabo bishwe mu bitero vy'igiporisi. Brésil nico gihugu ku mugabane wa Amerika cakuyeho ubwa nyuma ubucakara mu 1888, igihe umwamikazi Isabel  atereye igikumu kw'itegeko riha ubwigenge abacakara. Abirabure ba Brésil bahimbaza isabukuru ry'ivanwaho ry'ubucakara ku wa 20 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, umusi bibukirako igandagurwa rya Zumbi dos Palmares yari arongoye umuryango w'abacakara bigumuye. Josiane Peçanha wo mw'ishirahamwe Afrodivas, yabwiye TV Globo mu myiyerekano yariko ibera mu karere ka Niterói, mu gisagara ca Rio ati: "Gushika ubu abirabure nta burenganzira bafise. Uyu ni umusi mwiza wo kwiyumvira ibikomere vy'ubucakara twagize muri Brésil". Muri Brésil, ibice hafi 57%  vy'abanyagihugu bose ni abirabure canke imvange, ariko ishirahamwe ryigenga, Brazilian Forum on Public Safety, rivuga ko bibiri vya bitatu (2/3) vy'abicwa ari abirabure canke imvange. Icegeranyo c'ikigo kijewe ibarura, IBGE, co mu 2019, kivuga ko bangana n'ica gatatu gusa mu nzego nyobozi z'amakompanyi, bakaba bangana n'ica kane gusa mu nama nshingamateka ya Brésil, ariko bakaba bangana na bitatu vya bine vy'abashomeri mu gihugu. Mu gisagara ca São Paulo, imyiyerekano yaratunganijwe kw'ibarabara rya Avenida Paulista, rimwe mu mabarabara makuru makuru y'iki gisagara, aho abayiteguye bavuga ko abantu 7000 ari bo bayitabiriye. Abari muri yo, bari bisize irangi ritukura ku minwe banasiga n'irangi kw'ibendera rya Brésil nk'ikimenyetso c'ihohoterwa bakorerwa. Umwe mu bari muri iyi myiyerekano, João de Oliveira, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ati: "Turi ng'aha kugira twiyamirize ububeshi ngo ubucakara bwarahavuye, hamwe n'amahano yabereye i Jacarezinho. Perezida  Bolsonaro n'icegera ciwe barashimagije ubu bwicanyi. Ariko akora ihonyabwoko. Turi ng'aha ngo tuvyiyamirize". Imyiyerekano kandi yarabaye no mu bindi bisagara bikuru bikuru harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Brasília, aho imyiyerekano yabereye hanze y'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu. Aciye kuri twitter, uyu mukuru w'igihugu -  yahoze ari intwazangabo mu gisirikare yashigikiye impinduka mu mategeko ziha ubudahangarwa abajejwe umutekano iyo bishe abantu bari ku kazi - yarakeje igiporisi kuri ico gitero. Perezida Bolsonaro yari aherutse guhakana ko ata vangura rishingiye ku rukoba rirangwa mu gihugu, n'aho imishamirano iheruka itari mike yerekanye ko igihugu kirangwamwo amacakubiri akomeye. Mu mwaka uheze, igandagurwa bunyamaswa ry'umwirabure yari mu minwe y'abazungu babiri bari bajejwe gucungera inzu y'akaguriro ryarateje uburakari mu gihugu.

column2: Ethiopia – Tigray: Ingene isasika ry'abantu ryagenze mu gisagara ntakorwako ca Aksum muri Ethiopia
column3: Ingabo za Eritrea zagwanye mu ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia zarishe abantu amajana muri Aksum cane cane mu minsi ibiri yo mu kwezi kwa 11, nk'uko ababibonye babivuga. Ubwicanyi bw'ikivunga bwo kw'itariki 28 na 29 z'ukwa 11 bushobora kuba ari icaha  gikorewe zina muntu, nk'uko Amnesty International ibivuga mu cegeranyo cayo. Uwabibonye yabwiye BBC ingene imivyimba y'abantu yamaze iminsi  mu mabarabara itarahambwa, myinshi iribwa n'imfyisi. Ministre wa Eritrea wo kumenyesha amakuru Yemane G. Meskel yiyamirije ico cegeranyo avuga ko "kidashoboka" kandi ari "irementanya". Yanditse kuri Twitter ngo abo Amnesty yita ababibonye ni abagwanyi bashigikiye TPLF, umugambwe wahora urongoye Tigray,  ari nawo ukutumvikana kwawo na reta ya Ethiopia kwakweze iyo ntambara muri iyo ntara. Ubu reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gufatanya n'amakungu mu gukora amatohoza. N'ubwo ifise amakenga ku buryo Amnesty yakoresheje mu gukora ico cegeranyo, reta yemeye ko hari ibibazo bikwiye gutera impungenge cane biri muri co. Ethiopia na Eritrea vyompi birahakana ko ingabo za Eritrea zagize uruhara mu ntambara ya Tigray. Iyo ntambara yadutse itariki 4 z'ukwa 11 mu 2020 igihe reta ya Ethiopia yagaba igitero kugira ituze TPLF inyuma y'aho abagwanyi b'uwo mugambwe bafatiye amakambi y'ingabo za reta muri Tigray. Ministre wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed, yaronse agashimwe k'amahoro kitirirwe Nobel, yabwiye inama nshingamateka ku wa 30 ukwa 11 ko ata ''munyagihugu asanzwe (civil) n'umwe yishwe muri ico gitero". Ariko ababibonye baravuze ingene uwo munsi batanguye guhamba bamwe mu banyagihugu ata birwanisho bafise bari bishwe n'ingabo za Eritrea - benshi muri abo bakaba bari abahungu n'abagabo barasiwe mu mabarabara mw'isakwa ry'inzu ku nzu. Amnesty  International ifise amasanamu  ya satellite y'urugero runini mu kubona neza yo ku  wa 13 ukwezi kwa 12 yerekana ubutaka bw'amasinde bihuye n'imva za vuba ku masengero abiri muri Aksum, igisagara ca kera c'intakorwako ku ba Kristu b'aba Orthodoxe bo muri Ethiopia. Uguca uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no kubuza gushika muri Tigray vyatumye amakuru y'ivyabereye muri iyo ntara ateba kumenyekana. Muri Aksum, amatara m'amaterefone bivugwa ko vyahagaze gukora ku munsi wa mbere w'intambara. Ingabo za Ethiopia na Eritrea zatanguye gusukira ibisasu ku buseruko bwa Aksum ku wa kane itariki 19 ukwezi kwa 11 , nk'uko bivugwa n'abantu bo muri ico gisagara. Umukozi umwe wa reta yabwiye BBC ati: "Ico gitero carakomeje amasaha atanu kandi kidahagarara. Abantu bari mu masengero, mu buriro, mu mahoteri no mu ngo zabo barapfuye. Mu ngabo zifise ibigwanisho  muri ico gisagara nta wigeze asubiza -ubiravye cari kigambiriye abanyagihugu basanzwe [aba civil]". Amnesty yatororokanije ubuhamya bwinshi busa n'ubwo buvuga ingene gusukira ibisasu vyakomeje ku banyagihugu basanzwe kuri uwo mugoroba. Bamaze kugenzura ico gisagara, abasirikare, akenshi  baboneka ko ari abanyaEritrea, bakoze  isakwa ryo kurondera abasirikare ba TPLF canke abandi bagwanyi canke ''uwo wese afise inkoho'', nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty. Umugore umwe yabwiye  Amnesty ati: ''Hari ubwicanyi bwinshi... ku nzu ku nzu''. Deprose Muchena wa Amnesty avuga ko hari ivyemezo bifadika vyinshi vy'uko  ingabo za Ethiopia na Eritrea zakoze ''ivyaha vyinshi vyo mu ntambara mu gitero cazo co kugaruza Aksum". Ku ndwi ikurikira , ubuhammya buvuga ko ingabo za Ethiopia zagumye muri Aksum, iza Eritrea zo zikaja hirya mu buseruko mu gisagara ca Adwa. Uwabibonnye yabwiye BBC uko ingabo za Ethiopia zasahuye amabanki yo muri ico gisagara ico gihe. Ingabo za Eritrea bivugwa ko zagarutse haheze  indwi. Intambara yo ku wa 28 ukwa 11 yakabuwe n'igitero c'abagwanyi ba TPLF batari bafise ibigwanisho bikwiye, ku bw'icigeranyo ca Amnesty. Hagati y'abagwanyi 50 na 80 bo muri Aksum bagavye igitero ku kirindiro c'ingabo za  Eritrea ku mutumba uhanamiye igisagara mu gitondo. Umugabo w'imyaka 26 yari  muri ico gitero yabwiye Amnesty ati: "Twashaka gukingira igisagara cacu duca tugerageza kukigwanira na cane cane mu kwanka ko abanyaEritrea bacinjira…Bari bazi kurasa kandi bari bafise amaradiyo, guhanahana amakuru….Nta nkoho nari mfise, inkoni yonyene." Ntibiziwi neza umwanya iyo ntambara yamaze, ariko kuri uwo muhingamo, ama kamyo n'ibiduga bitamenwa n'amasasu vyaciye  vyinjira muri Aksum, nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty. Ababibonye bavuga ko abanyaEritrea baciye birara mu bantu,barasa abagabo n'abahungu  basanzwe ata bigwanisho bafise bari hanze ku mabarabara, barabandanya gushika ku mugoroba. Umugabo  w'imyaka nka 20 yabwiye Amnesty ivyerekeye ubwicanyi bwabereye kw'ibarabara rikuru: "Nari mw'igorofa ya kabiri ry'inyubakwa ndaba ,ncishije mw'idirisha abanyaEritrea bariko barica abakiri bato." Abasirikare,bamenyekanye ko ari abanya-Eritrea atari ukubera umwambaro wabo n'imparati z'imodoka zabo gusa ahubwo kubera indimi bavuga(icarabu n'igiTigrinya co muri Eritrea),baciye batangura gusaka inzu ku nzu. "Novuga ko kwari ukwihora," nk'uko umusore umwe yabwiye BBC. "Bica umugabo wese babonye. Wuguruye umwango bakabonamwo umugabo, baca bamwica,utuguruye baca barasa bakugurura ku nguvu." Yari yinyegeje mu nzu y'ubutambiro hanyuma arabona umugabo yatowe akicwa n'abasirikare b'abanyaEritrea kandi aguma abasaba ngo bamureke: "yabawira ngo: 'Jewe ndi umu civil,nkora muri banki." Uwundi mugabo yabwiye BBC ko yabonye abagabo batandatu bishwe, nk'abayonzwe,  hanze y'inzu yiwe hafi y'ihoteri Abnet ku munsi ukurikira ku wa 29 ukwezi kwa 11. "Barabatondetse umurongo hanyuma babarasa mu mugongo babahagaze inyuma.Babiri muri bo nari ndabazi. Twarabana.Barababajije:'Inkoho zanyu zirihe' hanyuma nabo barishura: 'Nta nkoho tugira,turi aba civil." Ababibonye bavuga ko mu ntango abasirikare ba Eritrea batashaka ko hari uwegera abiciwe  ku mabarabara-uwugerageje kubikora baca bamurasa. Umugore umwe, abahungwabo babiri b'imyaka 29 na 14 bishwe, yavuze ko amabarabara ''yari yuzuye ibiziga". Amnesty ivuga ko inararibonye n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia bamaze kubijamwo, gushingura abantu vyahavuye bitangura haheze iminsi myinshi,amaziko menshi akaba yabaye itariki 30 z'ukwa 11 abantu benshi bamaze kuzana ibiziga ku masengero -rimwe na rimwe 10 icarimwe bari mu nkorofani z'ibiti zikwegwa n'ifarasi canke indogobwe. Kw'ihoteri Abnet, umukozi wa reta yavuganye na BBC yavuze ko hari ibiziga vyamaze iminsi ine bitaravanwa aho abantu biciwe. "Ibiziga vyari iruhande y'ihoteri Abnet na cinema ya Seattle vyariwe n'imfyisi.Twasanze amagufa gusa. Twahamvye amagufa. "Novuga ko hishwe abanyagihugu basanzwe amajana 8 muri Aksum." Ibi avuga  birahura n'ibivugwa n'umu diyakoni wo kw'isengero yabwiye Associated Press ko ibiziga vyinshi vyari vyarariwe n'imfyisi. Yarafashije kwegeranya indaangamuntu z'abishwe  hanyuma arafasha mu guhamba mu binogo rusangi,nawe nyene akaba yibaza ko hishwe abantu amajana 8 mu mpera z'iyo ndwi. Abantu 41 barokotse n'abavyiboneye Amnesty yabajije batanze amazina y'abantu  barenga amajana abiri bazi bishwe. Ababibonye bavuga ko abanyaEritra bagiye mu bikorwa vyo gusahura , abantu bamaze guhunga ari benshi, vyaciye biba hose kandi bikuzako. Kaminuza,  amazu y'abantu,amahoteri,ibitaro, ibigega vy'intete,ahakorerwa imiduga,banki,imangazini,aho bakorera imikate n'ayandi mabutike bivugwa ko vyari mu vyo batumbera. Umugabo umwe yabwiye Amnesty ko abasirikare ba Ethiopia bananiwe no kubuza abanyaEritrea gusahura inzu y'uwo bavukana. "Baratwaye TV,imodoka y'ijipe,frigo,metela zitandatu,ivyo kurya vyose vyari mu nzu n'amavuta yo guteka,amavuta yo gusiga umukate, ifu ya teff [indya ngenderwako muri Ethiopia], ububati bwo mu gikoni, impuzu, inzoga ziri muri frigo, icuma co kuduza amazi, na laptop." Uwo musore yavuganye na BBC yavuze ko azi imodoka 15 z'umugwizatunga wo muri ico gisagara zasahuwe. Ibi vyaragize ingaruka ku basigaye muri Aksum, vyabasize batagira indya zo kubatunga n'imiti yo kwivuza, nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty. Abibonye  bavuga ko ubusuma bw'ivyuma vyo gupompa amazi vyatumye basigara banywa amazi yo mu nzuzi. Kivugwa ko ariho havukiye Umwamikazi wa Sheba avugwa muri Bibiriya yagize urugendo i Yaruzaremu agiye kuraba Umwami Salomon. Baravyaranye umwana w'umuhungu-Menelek I-bivugwa ko ariwe yazanye i Aksum L'Arche d'Alliance/The Ark of Covenant (Isandugu ry'Isezerano),bivugwa ko ariyo yarimwo amabwirizwa 10 Imana yahaye Musa. Yama icunzwe buri gihe mw'isengero rya Our Lady Mary of Zion iri muri ico gisagara kandi nta n'umwe arekuriwe kuyibona. Ibirori bikomeye vy'idini birakorerwa kuri iyo sengero buri 30 ukwezi kwa 11, bikitabwa n'abaje gushengera bavuye irya n'ino muri Ethiopia no kw'isi, ariko mu mwaka uheze  ntivyabaye kubera intambara. Uwo mukozi wa reta yavuganye na BBC yavuze ko abasirikare ba Eritrea baje kuri iyo sengero itariki 3 ukwezi kwa 12 ''baratera ubwoba abapatiri babahatira kubaha umusaraba w'inzahabu n'ifeza''. Ariko avuga ko abadiyakoni n'abandi bakiri bato bagiye gukingira iyo sandugu. "Wari umugumuko udasanzwe. Umugabo wese n'umugore wese barabagwanya. Bararashe barica bamwe, ariko turanezerewe ko twashoboye gukingira ibintu vyacu vy'agaciro."

column2: Amagorwa yo kubaho ufise indwara idasanzwe ituma "ashobora gutabwa nk'akanuka"
column3: Fide Mirón yari afise imyaka 18 igihe atangura kubona ko ariko arahohoterwa n'urunganwe mu gisagara ca Barcelona. Baramwirukanye, bamufata nk'igikinisho, nk'uko we nyene abivuga. Bamuraba nk'agahabwa baravye isura yiwe ingene yari imeze, isura yiwe yahindutse kubera indwara izwi kw'izina rya porphyrie érythropoïétique congénitale. Iyo ni indwara idasanzwe idakunze kwibonekeza ariko mbi cane, yanduye kuva akiri uruhinja. Haciye imyaka 15, Fide yahawe ubutumwa budasanzwe. Bwari buvuye kuri umwe mu bahora bamutyekeza, ariko asaba imbabazi ku nyifato y'ubwana - nk'uko wenyene abivuga ubu - yerekanye kuri we igihe yari mu myaka y'ubuyabaga. Uyu nyene kwigaya yaributse Fide igihe yariko atanga ikiganiro ku banyamakuru aho yavuze ko yarwanije uyu muntu yari fafashwe n'indwara ico gihe yitwa Günther. Ariko rero ntakunda kuvuga "ivyamubayeko muri kahise". Ntaco bikivuze kuri we. Ikimuha ingoga ni uko ubuzima bwiwe bwitaweho cane mbere n'utwigoro tukaba turiko turakorwa kugira ngo haboneke inyishu canke umuti wo gushobora kugabanya ingaruka z'indwara yiwe. Ni indwara mbi cane. Yonona igitigu (umwijima mu Kinyarwanda), igatuma umuntu akama amaraso, akagira ibisebe ku ruhu. Ibihimba vy'umubiri birabora gushika aho bikoroka, arico gituma bayita 'porphyria mutilante'. Mirón ubu afise imyaka 46, uku niko asigura ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Iyi ndwara irababaza cane. Ibisebe vyatanguye kwibonekeza afise amezi atandatu gusa, akiri uruhinja. Abavyeyi banje barantwaye kwa muganga, ariko ico gihe nta bintu vyinshi vyari bizwi kuri ino ndwara. Ico bambwiye conyene ni izina ryayo. Nta muti wari ho - mbere gushika n'ubu ntawubaho - kandi gushika ubu nta wuzi nimba uzoteba uboneka. Ati: "Ikintu conyene cari kizwi ni uko yari indwara ikomeye cane, vyumvikana ko ntari gushobora kubaho mu buzima busanzwe nk'ubw'abandi. "Vyari ngombwa ko ngerageza kwirinda ico cose cotuma nsinzikara, nategerezwa kwirinda kuja ku zuba. "Kubera ko iyi ndwara yanteye gukama amaraso, nakenera guhabwa amaraso buri minsi 15. Mu bwana bwanje bwose namye mpabwa aya maraso. "Iyi ndwara yaza nk'ikiza, uko bukeye uko bwije. Uko navyuka mu gitondo niko nasanga haje igikomere gishasha. Kubera ibikomere naracitse ibikonjo, isura yanje irasibangana. Bwari ububabare budahera, burenze urugero, bubabaza umutima." Ku myaka 14, niho umubiri wiwe wahagarika ivyo kwama aterwa amaraso. Indwara yarahagaze. Ariko ntaho yagiye, ni nk'uko yabaye imuhaye akaruhuko. "Ububabare burabandanya, ariko ntabwo bikomeye nko mu bwana bwanje. Iriyadukiza." Isura yisa "Si nsa n'abandi kubera ingaruka z'iyi ndwara. Ziribonekeza. Ndazi neza ko zishobora kuntuma ntabwa nk'akanuka. "Ariko ibi ntaco bimbwiye. "Umuntu wese yashatse kumenya uwo ndi we aranzi ingene meze n'ico nshoboye. "Umuntu wese yagumanye n'umurwayi Fide yarabonye ko ubu buzima n'ububabare nagize vyampaye inguvu. "Nivyo koko narababaye cane igihe iyo miyabaga i Barcelona bariko barantyekeza. "Umuntu arigira uw'ejo agafata ko ata n'umwe ariko aramuraba. Ku muhingamo w'uyo munsi narabaye igikinisho ciwe. "Ariko ivyo ni ibisanzwe, ni ikintu gito cane c'ubwana, ariko kubona inyuma y'imyaka myinshi yubahutse kunsaba imbabazi biranezereye cane. Nta nyishu Akomeza ati: "Ikintu kibi cane ntabwo ari ububabare umuntu yumva, ni irungu. Ntabwo nshaka kuvuga irungu ry'ukuba uri ukwawe, oya, ahubwo ni irungu ryo kubura inyishu, ukabura n'abakwereka inzira wofata. "Mfise abaganga banshigikira, ariko ntabwo higeze haboneka umuti nyawo. "Ni ibihe biremereye cane rwose kandi bibabaza, iyo wumva ko inzira zose zugaye kandi utagira iyo uja. "Iyo mbajije inyishu, numva umengo ndiko ntera ingorane. Ikibazo canje kiragoye cane kandi kubera ko twese tugenda twihuta, rimwe na rimwe twitaho gusa ibintu twibaza ko dushobora gutorera umuti. "Si benshi bameze nkanje." Yongera ati: "Kuva nkiri muto natanguye kurondera abandi bantu boba bameze nkanje kugira ngo duhimirize ubushakashatsi mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti. "Hari umwe nashoboye gutora muri Cuba, uwundi muri Brezili, uwundi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. "Ndafise abantu umunani bari muri Espanye. Nka bose bameze neza, ariko mu ci riheze hari umugenzi yapfuye. "Indwara yiwe yahavuye imera nabi. Ntushobora kumenya uko ibintu bizogenda. "Nico gituma ubu nitayeho cane kuyerekana no kurondera inyishu. "Kimwe mu vyo nashoboye gushikako mu bushakashatsi nakoze, ni uko nashoboye guhura na muganga Millet maze dutangura urugendo rwo kurondera umuti. "Iyi nzira iriko iratanga umwimbu kuko mu myaka ibiri iheze hashoboye kuboneka umuti ukora kuri ino ndwara. "Waramaze kwemzwa n'ikigo c'ubuvuzi c'i Burayi (European Medicines Agency) ubu turindiriye ko bawukorera igerageza mu buvuzi kugira ngo turabe ingaruka zawo ku barwayi." Ni inzira itanga umwizero. "Umuryango wanje wambereye ubuzima bwanje. Papa yampaye amaraso nari nkeneye kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho, ariko maze kugera ku myaka icenda yarapfuye ahitanywe n'isanganya ry'umuduga. Urupfu rwiwe rwaradukozeko twese, ariko cane cane jewe. "Inkingi y'amagara yanje yari isenyutse ni umuntu yampaye amaraso yiwe. "Ubuzima ni amazi. Uno munsi uriho ariko ejo nturiho. Nategerezwa kurwana kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho. "Ku rundi ruhande, mama yamye anshigikira kandi yikoreye umuzigo munini w'indwara yanje. Ni umuntu akomeye cane kandi ntiyigeze ahengeshanya kunyitaho. "Ubu ntegerezwa kwitaho ubuzima bwanje gusumba, ariko iyo ndonse akanya ndakunda gutembera, nkabonana n'abantu kugira ngo nsangire ivyiyumviro nabo. "Ubu ubuzima bwanje bwarahindutse. Nk'umugore akiri muto, sinashoboye kwiga kubera uburakari bw'iyi ndwara n'imiti yayo ibabaza cane, ariko natanguye igikorwa co kwigisha abantu. "Ikinti ico ari co cose kiba mu buzima gitanga icigwa kanaka. "Numva umengo nshobora kuguruka".

column2: Inzara ku rugi rwa Somalia, ku bwa ONU
column3: Inzara iri ku rugi rw'ibice bimwe bimwe vya Somalia, nk'uko vyagabishijwe  kuri uyu wa mbere n'uwujejwe ibibazo vy'abari mu kaga, Martin Griffiths. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku murwa mukuru Mogadishu, yavuze ko afise ibimenyetso bifadika ko inzara ishobora gushika mu bice vyo mu bumanuko bwo hagati muri Somalia hagati y'amezi ya  Gitugutu (10) na Kigarama(12). Ivyo abivuze inyuma y'urugendo yagize i Baidoa mu ntara ya South-West muri Somalia- akarere k'ico gihugu kugarijwe kurusha izindi n'uruzuba rugeramiye Afrika y'ubuseruko. Inyuma y'ibiringo bine vy'imvura itagwa, ico gisagara kiguma cakira abantu ata kintu na kimwe bagisigaranye kubera urwo ruzuba   amashirahamwe agereranya ko rwatumye abantu barenga miriyoni imwe bata izabo. Ayo mashirahamwe avuga  kandi ko urwo ruzuba ari rwo  mbere rukaze muri ako karere k'ihembe rya Afrika mu myaka 40. Abantu muri Kenya, Ethiopia na Somalia birabagora kuronka ico bashira  ku munwa , mu gihe abantu baharurwa muri miriyoni 22 muri ako karere bashobora kwugarizwa n'inzara ikomeye. Kuba ibintu bimeze gutyo biva ku rufatangane rw'imvo zitandukanye, kandi nta  kimenyetso c'uko ibintu bitera bimera neza. Ihindagurika ry'ibihe ni imwe mu mvo zikomeye, mu gihe intambara muri  Ethiopia na Sonalia, hamwe n'iduga ry'ibiciro kubera intambara muri Ukraine vyaje gutuma ikibazo gikomera kuruta.

column2: Kurwara amano biturutse kuri Covid: Icigwa kirabisigura
column3: Abahinga mu bumenyi (science) bemeza ko bashobora gusigura igituma abantu bamwe bamwe banduye Covid baheza bagahurirwa canke bagafurutira ku mano canke ku ntoke. Guhurirwa canke gufurutira ku mano bisa n'uko ari imwe mu ngaruka z'umubiri uba  wafashe inzira yo kurwana kugira wivune umugera. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko batoye neza na neza ibice vy'indinganizo y'umubiri yo kwigwanira bigira uruhara muri ivyo bishikira amano. Ivyatowe, biri muri  British Journal of Dermatology - ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza candikwamwo ibijanye n'indwara z'urukoba (uruhu) -  bishobora gufasha gutora imiti yo kworohereza amano. Ni iki kurwara amano bitewe na Covid? Bishobora gushika ku myaka iyari yo yose, ariko akenshi bikarira abana n'abayabaga (abangavu). Kuri bamwe nta bubabare bitera, ariko uko gufurutira gushobora kubabaza kandi kugatera kwiyagaza cane no kuvyimba. Sofia, w'imyaka  13 aba muri Ecose (Scotland) , vyageze aho bihakwa kumunanira gutambuka canke kwambara ibirato igihe yarwara amano biturutse kuri Covid mu minsi iheze. Yageze aho yifashisha intebe ry'abagendana ubumuga canke abarwaye badashobora kwigendera  (wheel chair/chaise roulante) iyo yaba ashaka kuja kure. Igice kirwaye, - akenshi amano, ariko rimwe na rimwe n'intoke - gishobora guhishira. Hari n'abavyimba bakababara canke urukoba rukagangatara.  Hashobora kuza  n'amashira. Hari ababimarana amezi, abandi amayinga. Akenshi, nta kimenyetso na kimwe  bagira mu bisanzwe biranga indwara ya Covid, nk'inkorora idahera,  , ubushuhe no kutamoterwa canke kutumva igisosa canke ikurura. Kubera iki bishika? Ibiherutse gutorwa muri ico cigwa , bishingiye ku bipimo vy'amaraso n'urukoba , vyerekana ko hari ibice bibiri vy'indinganizo y'umubiri yo  kwirwanira bishobora kuba bfise uruhara. Vyompi bizanamwo inzira umubiri ukoresha mu kurwanya umugera. Imwe ni proteine igwanya umugera yitwa interferon y'ubwoko bwa mbere, hanyuma hari n'ubundi bwoko  bw'umusirikare w'umubiri yihenda akarwanya  uturemangingo bwite tw'umuntu, aho kurwanya uwo mugera wonyene. Uturemangingo turi ku nzira  zitwara amaraso ahaba harwaye natwo tugira uruhara nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo kuri kaminuza ya Paris mu Bufaransa. Abashakashatsi bize abantu 50 bikekwa kuba barwaye amano bitewe na Covid ku mpeshi ya 2020, n'abandi 13 bari bafise ibimenyetso bisa navyo ariko vyo  ataho bihuriye na Covid kuko vyabaye imbere cane y'uko ikiza ca Covid caduka. Bizeye ko ivyatowe bizofasha abarwaye n'abaganga  gutahura ibishikira amano. Umuganga avura indwara z'ibirenge mu Bwongereza Dr Ivan Bristow  avuga ko kenshi - guhurirwa canke gufurutira bitewe n'ibicurane canke ku bantu bafise ingorane z'itembera ry'amaraso - birikiza vyo nyene. Ariko hari n'igihe bikenerwa ko hakoreshwa amavuta yo kuhasiga canke imiti. Avuga ati "ubwo ikibitera cemejwe bizofasha kumenya ingene bivurwa neza gusumba". Avuga ko indwara zifata urukoba kubera ingaruka za Covid zishobora kuza haheze igihe umuntu yayirwaye bikomeye no ku bantu ata bindi bimenyetso bagaragaje, gutyo isano na Covid ntiryama rihari.

column2: Umunyamakuru akaba n'umwanditsi kuri Afrika akomeye, Pierre Pean, yapfuye
column3: Pierre Pean, umuhinga kuri Afrika akaba yaranditse n'ibitabo vyinshi yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo kuwa kane afise imyaka 81. Nk'uko bivugwa n'igitangazamakuru co mu Bufaransa, France 24, umunyamakuru Pierre Pean, umukozi w'itohoza abushitse, yibanze cane kuri Afrika, n'ibitangazamakuru. Yibanze kandi ku banyepolitike - cane cane kahise katabonwa kumwe k'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Francois Mitterrand mu gihe aba Nazi bari bacigaruriye Ubufaransa. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo tariki 25/07/2019 nk'uko umuryango wiwe wabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru, AFP. Umuhungu wiwe w'umwanditsi Jean Gregor, yabwiye AFP ko Pierre Pean yahitanywe n'uburwayi ku bitaro vya Argenteuil mu karere ka Val-d'Oise. Ikinyamakuru co kuri internet, France Bleu, canditse ko Pierre Pean atakunda ko bamwita umunyamakuru w'itohoza. Mu matohoza yiwe yibanda ku kwerekana ukuntu ivyo atohoza canke abo atohozako bagoranye. Yavuze ko yaba ashaka gutohoza yidegemvya, ku bintu yihitiyemwo kandi ku gushaka kwiwe, ntabwirizwe canke ngo ajane narwo afatiye ku bivugwa mu bitangazamakuru canke imanza zo mu ma sentare. Yarandanitse ku Rwanda igitabo yise "Noir Fureur Blanc Menteur: Rwanda 1990-1994", igitabo kitashimwe n'ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda. Muri ico gitabo casohotse mu 2005, Pierre Pean ashira akabazo ku nkuru ya jenoside yo mu Rwanda ku buryo ivugwa n'ubutegetsi. Ku bw'ico gitabo, uwo mwanditsi yararezwe muri sentare n'ishirahamwe SOS Racisme, rimwagiriza "kugira uruhara mu gukwega urwanko rufatiye ku moko", kuko yanditse ko Abatutsi "bafise umuco w'ikinyoma no guhishahisha." Urwo rubanza yararutsinze.

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu. column2: U Rwanda rurababajwe n’icegeranyo c’abahinga ba ONU muri DR Congo
column3: Reta y'u Rwanda ivuga ko ibabajwe n'utunenge turi mu cegeranyo c'umurwi w'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko ingabo zarwo zabonetse mu bice bitandukanye mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Mu rwandiko rwaraye rusohowe nijoro ku wa gatanu, reta y'u Rwanda yamirira kure ibiri muri ico cegeranyo co ku wa 23 z'ukwezi ka cumi na kabiri guheze, igashimangira ko "ata basirikare b'u Rwanda bari ku butaka bwa Congo, kandi ko ata bikorwa vya gisirikare biherutse guhuza igisirikare c'u Rwanda n'ica Congo". Iki cegeranyo gishasha c'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko amatohoza bakoze yerekana ibikorwa vy'ingabo z'u Rwanda n'iz'Uburundi muri ako karere ka Congo. ONU ivuga ko kwivanga kw'ingabo z'ikindi gihugu mu bikorwa vyo kurwanya inyeshamba muri DR Congo hatamenyeshejwe komite ya ONU biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Muri uru rwandiko, reta y'u Rwanda ivuga ko uyu murwi w'abahinga ba ONU wirengagije amakuru ngirakamaro n'insiguro vyatanzwe na reta y'u Rwanda, mu gihe bari "bahawe uburenganzira bwo gushikira inzego zitandukanye za reta, banoroherezwa kuvugana n'ivyabona kandi banahabwa n'inyishu ku bibazo vyose babajije". Reta y'u Rwanda ibona ko uyu murwi ata bwigenge ufise mu vyegeranyo vyawo, mbere ko abawugize bafata minenerwe amabanga yabo. U Rwanda ruvuga ko rushimishwa n'imigenderanire myiza irangwa hagati yarwo na Congo mu bisata bitandukanye, harimwo n'ugufashanya mu vya gisirikare, ariko bikagarukira gusa, nk'uko iri tangazo ribivuga, "ku guhanahana amakuru ku mirwi y'inyeshamba iri mu buseruko bwa Congo, itera umudugararo mu bihugu vyompi". Reta y'Uburundi yoyo ntaco irashikiriza kuri iki cegeranyo gishasha c'aba bahinga ba ONU kivuga ko hari ingabo z'u Burundi n'Imbonerakure babonetse mu duce twa Fizi na Uvira mu ntara ya  Kivu y'Ubumanuko hagati y'ukwa 11/2019 n'ukwa 07/2020. Hagati aho, mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze, umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Jean Claude Karerwa yabwiye BBC mu butumwa bwanditse , ata basirikare b'Uburundi bari mu kindi gihugu mu buryo butazwi.

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Coronavirus: WHO isaba ibihugu vya Afrika kutajugunya incanco zataye igihe
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, risaba ibihugu vya Afrika kudaturira incanco za Covid-19 zishobora kuba zarataye igihe. Ibi bihugu vyasabwe kubangira bikarindira iyindi nzira nyayo. Aka kamo ka OMS kaje inyuma y'aho ibihugu vya Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo bitangarije ko bitegura guturira doze hafi 70.000 z'urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca kubera zataye igihe hagati muri uku kwa kane. Ariko ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara (Africa CDC) kivuga ko cari cijejwe ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise, zishobora gukoreshwa. Incanco nyinshi zirashobora gukoreshwa gushika ku mezi 36 (umwaka n'igice) kuva zihinguwe, ariko kubera ko izi za Covid-19 ari nshasha, nta vyemezo bikwiye bihari vyerekana ko zishobora kumara igihe kirekire zigifise inguvu. Ingingo ya nyuma izofatwa n'ibisata vy'ibihugu bijejwe kugenzura imiti. Igikorwa co gucandaga abantu mu kubakingira coronavirus muri Afrika kigenda bukebuke, ahanini kubera atazihari zikwiye hamwe n'abantu benshi bazifiseko amakenga. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kane, John Nkengasong,  arongoye ikigo Africa CDC yavuze ati:  "Akamo ntera ibihugu vya Afrika ni aka: nimba uruhara rwacu ari ukurondera izi ncanco, namwe uruhara rwanyu ni uko mukoresha izi ncanco". Malawi ivuga ko itegura guturira doze zirenga 16.000 z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca rwahinguwe na kompanyi y'Ubuhindi, Serum Institute of India (SII), kubera igihe cazo ntarengwa cari gushika ku wa 13 z'uku kwa kane. Ku ruhande rwayo, Sudani y'Epfo itegura guturira doze hafi 59.000 kuri iyo mvo nyene. Izi ncanco zari zahawe ibihugu 13 vya Afrika mu mugambi wo gufashanya hagati y'Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika (UA) n'ikompanyi y'itumatumanako MTN , nk'uko bivugwa na Peter Mwai wo mu gisata Reality Check ca BBC. Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika waguze umuriyoni wa doze za  AstraZeneca zari muri Afrika y'Epfo yari yahagaritse gutanga kubera amakenga ko zitari gukinga ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwari burwiriye muri ico gihugu. Ikigo Africa CDC caciye kizirungika mu bihugu mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, hasigaye indwi nkeya ngo zite igihe. Nkengasong yavuze ko ikompanyi Serum Institute of India (SII) yahanuye Africa CDC ko "izi ncanco zishobora kubandanya zikoreshwa mu kiringo c'amezi icenda inyuma y'itariki ntarengwa". Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti , asaba ibihugu "kubika neza izi ncanco mu gihe tukibandanya twiga twongera tugerageza kurondera kumenya nimba izi ncanco zishobora gukoreshwa mu kiringo kirekire". Uretse Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo, OMS ivuga ko Ghana na Sierra Leone navyo nyene bitakoresheje incanco zose kubera zari zataye igihe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Sierra Leone avuga ko igihugu cari gisigaranye hafi ica gatatu ca doze cari cahawe. Austin Demby  yabwiye BBC ati:  "Twategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose tugakoresha izi ncanco". Ku bihugu 55 vya Afrika, 41 nivyo vyahawe incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu Covax wo guhanahana izi ncanco. Hari ibindi indwi bikirindiriye kuronswa igice ca mbere. Umugambi wa Covax ufise intumbero yo gusaranganya incanco mu bihugu vyose ku rugero rungana, vyaba ibitunze canke ibikenye. Gushika ubu, doze zingana n'imiriyoni 38 nizo zimaze guhabwa ibihugu 98. Abahinga bavuga ko kugira ngo iki kiza karanda kirwanye ari uko incanco ziatangwa ku rugero rungana ku bihugu vyose kw'isi.

column2: Kylian Mbappe imbere ya Messi na Ronaldo mu bakinyi batunze cane ku rutonde rwa Forbes uyu mwaka
column3: Kylian Mbappe aza mu kibanza ca mbere ku rutonde rwa Forbes  rw'abakinyi bafise amahera menshi - ubwa mbere umuntu atari Lionel Messi canke Cristiano Ronaldo abaye uwa mbere kuri urwo rutonde mu myaka icenda iheze. F﻿orbes igereranya ko uwo mukinyi w'imbere wa Paris St-Germain Mbappe w'imyaka 23, azoronka imiliyoni 128 z'amadolari muri uyu mwaka. U﻿wo bakinana na Mbappe muri PSG Messi ni uwa kabiri na miliyoni 120 z'amadolari hanyuma umukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester United Ronaldo akaza mu kibanza ca gatatu n'imiliyoni 100 z'amadolari. N﻿eymar na Mohammed Salah ni bo bakwiza igitigiri c'abakinyi batanu ba mbere. U﻿mukinyi w'imbere wa PSG na Brezil Neymar  azoronka amahera ashobora gushika imiliyoni 87 z'amadolari mu mwaka wa 2022-2023 hanyuma umukinyi w'imbere wa Liverpool Salah ayangana na miliyoni 53 z'amadolari. U﻿wundi mukinyi yigeze kuza ubwa mbere kuri urwo rutonde atari Messi na Ronaldo ni kizigenza w'umugwi w'Ubwongereza David Beckham mu mwaka wa 2013. M﻿bappe yashize umukono ku masezerano arimwo uturusho twinshi y'imyaka itatu na PSG mu kwezi kwa gatanu, biza kurangiza ibihuha vyamurungika mu mugwi wa Real Madrid mu ci. U﻿wo mufaransa yatwaye igikombe c'isi, amaze gutwara ibikombe 11 muri uwo mugwi, harimwo bine vy'ihiganwa ryo mu Bufaransa, kuva agiye muri uwo mugwi umutijwe na Monaco mu 2017. E﻿rling Haaland, amaze gutsinda ibitego 19 mu nkino 12 mu mugwi wa Manchester City kuva ashitse muri uwo mugwi avuye muri Borussia Dortmund, ari muri 10 ba mbere, ku nimero zitandatu. U﻿wo mukinyi w'imbere wa Norvege, n'umwe mu bakinyi bane bo mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza bari muri cumi ba mbere kuri urwo rutonde iruhande ya Ronaldo, Salah na mugenzi we bakinana muri Manchester City, Kevin de Bruyne.

column2: CECAFA U 23: Umumenyereza w'ikipe y'u Burundi avuga ko gushika muri 1/2 bitari vyoroshe
column3: Umumenyereza w'ikipe y'u Burundi y'abari munsi y'imyaka 23 avuga yuko umukino wabahaye itike yo kuja mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa rya CECAFA bayikuye kure. Jimmy Ndayizeye yavuze yuko abakinyi biwe bategerejwe gukora iyo bwabaga kugira bikure imbere ya Ethiopia bakanganya 1-1. U Burundi bwari bukeneye inota rimwe gusa kugira burengane nyuma yo gutsinda Eritrea mu rukino rwa mbere ibitsindo 3-0. Umumenyereza Jimmy Ndayizeye yagize ati: "Novuga yuko rutari urukino rwari rworoshe kuri twebwe [...] Ethiopie kuva match itangura gushika ihere baturushije bakinira muri 'camp' yacu, hanyuma badutangura igitsindo ariko ntitwigeze ducika intege." Ikipe Intamba mu Rugamba yari ikeneye kunganya muri uru rukino kugira ibandanye mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa, umumenyereza Ndayizeye akavuga ko ashimiria cane abakinyi biwe. Yagize ati: "Ndashimiye cane abakinyi banje ingene bashoboye gukina. Ni match twari dukeneyemwo inota rimwe kugira dushobore kurengana. Ni urukino rutari rworoshe." Mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa u Burundi buzohura n'igihugu ca Kenya kandi umumenyereza Jimmy Ndayizeye aremera ko naho nyene bitazokworoha kuko ikipe ya Kenya ifise inguvu hamwe n'ubuhinga. Yagize ati: "Naragerageje kuraba uko bakina, tugiye kubikorerako muri entraînements nka zibiri tugiye gukora turabe yuko dushobora kubatsinda." Izi nkino za CECAFA z'abatarenza imyaka 23 zibera mu muji wa Bahir Dar mu gihugu ca Ethiopia.
